amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of Part B amendments Nos. 106, 108, 110, 116, 117, 118, 120, 127, 128, 129, 132, 133, 134, 136, 138, 139, 140 and 145 printed in House Report 113-108.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A025) offered by Mr. McKeon.
On agreeing to the McKeon amendments (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.
